trans-unit.source: Represents the content of a SOAP header.
trans-unit.target: 表示 SOAP 标头的内容。

trans-unit.source: A message header contains optional metadata that describe a message encapsulated by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> class.
trans-unit.target: 消息头包含用于描述消息（由 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> 类包装）的可选元数据。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> can have zero or more headers that are used as an extension mechanism to pass information in messages that are application-specific.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> 可以没有标头或有一个或多个标头，这些标头作为一种扩展机制用来在特定于应用程序的消息中传递信息。

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A> to add message headers to a message by calling the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A> 方法，可使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Add%2A> 将消息头添加到消息中。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] provides a number of predefined message headers, as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 提供了很多预定义的消息头，如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: Header Name
trans-unit.target: 标头名称

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: To
trans-unit.target: 到

trans-unit.source: Contains the role that the message is targeting.
trans-unit.target: 包含作为消息投递目标的角色。

trans-unit.source: Action
trans-unit.target: 操作

trans-unit.source: Provides a description of how the message should be processed.
trans-unit.target: 提供应如何处理消息的说明。

trans-unit.source: FaultTo
trans-unit.target: FaultTo

trans-unit.source: Contains the address of the node to which faults should be sent.
trans-unit.target: 包含错误应发送到的节点的地址。

trans-unit.source: From
trans-unit.target: From

trans-unit.source: Contains the address of the node that sent the message.
trans-unit.target: 包含发送消息的节点的地址。

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: 请求

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the message is a request.
trans-unit.target: 指示消息是否为请求。

trans-unit.source: MessageID
trans-unit.target: MessageID

trans-unit.source: Contains the unique ID of the message.
trans-unit.target: 包含消息的唯一 ID。

trans-unit.source: RelatesTo
trans-unit.target: RelatesTo

trans-unit.source: Contains the IDs of messages that are related to this message.
trans-unit.target: 包含与此消息相关的消息的 ID。

trans-unit.source: ReplyTo
trans-unit.target: ReplyTo

trans-unit.source: Contains the address of the node to which a reply should be sent for a request.
trans-unit.target: 包含对请求的答复应发送到的节点的地址。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the targeted recipient of the message header.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置消息头的目标接收方。

trans-unit.source: The targeted recipient of the message header.
trans-unit.target: 消息头的目标接收方。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串("")。

trans-unit.source: If this property is empty, the header is interpreted as targeted for the ultimate recipient of the message.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为空，则消息头被解释为以消息的最终接收方为目标。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new message header.
trans-unit.target: 创建新消息头。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the header XML element.
trans-unit.target: 标头 XML 元素的本地名称。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the header XML element.
trans-unit.target: 标头 XML 元素的命名空间 URI。

trans-unit.source: The content of the header to be created.
trans-unit.target: 要创建的标头的内容。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new message header with the specified data.
trans-unit.target: 创建具有指定数据的新消息头。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader" /> object with the specified data.
trans-unit.target: 一个具有指定数据的新 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the header XML element.
trans-unit.target: 标头 XML 元素的本地名称。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the header XML element.
trans-unit.target: 标头 XML 元素的命名空间 URI。

trans-unit.source: The content of the header to be created.
trans-unit.target: 要创建的标头的内容。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether the header must be understood.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，指示是否必须理解该标头。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new message header with the specified data.
trans-unit.target: 创建具有指定数据的新消息头。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader" /> object with the specified data.
trans-unit.target: 一个具有指定数据的新 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader" /> 对象。

trans-unit.target: 标头 XML 元素的本地名称。

trans-unit.target: 标头 XML 元素的命名空间 URI。

trans-unit.source: The content of the header to be created.
trans-unit.target: 要创建的标头的内容。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer" /> that is used to serialize the header.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer" />，用于序列化标头。

trans-unit.source: Creates a header from an object to be serialized using the XmlFormatter.
trans-unit.target: 使用 XmlFormatter 从要序列化的对象创建标头。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader" /> object with the specified data.
trans-unit.target: 一个具有指定数据的新 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader" /> 对象。

trans-unit.target: 要创建的标头的内容。

trans-unit.target: 消息头的目标接收方。

trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer" />，用于序列化标头。

trans-unit.target: 一个值，指示是否必须理解该标头。

trans-unit.target: 消息头的目标接收方。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether the header should be relayed.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，指示是否应该中继标头。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new message header with the specified data.
trans-unit.target: 创建具有指定数据的新消息头。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader" /> object with the specified data.
trans-unit.target: 一个具有指定数据的新 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The object that contains information related to the version of SOAP associated with a message and its exchange.
trans-unit.target: 包含与 SOAP 版本（与消息及其交换关联）相关的信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: Verifies whether the specified message version is supported.
trans-unit.target: 验证是否支持指定的消息版本。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified message version is supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果支持指定的消息版本，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether this message header contains reference parameters of an endpoint reference.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指定此消息头是否包含终结点引用的引用参数。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this message header contains reference parameters of an endpoint reference; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此消息头包含终结点引用的引用参数，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A reference parameter corresponds to the <`ReferenceParameters`> element described in the in the [WS-Addressing specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=96163).
trans-unit.target: 引用参数对应于 <`ReferenceParameters`> 元素中所述在[Ws-addressing 规范](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=96163)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the header must be understood, according to SOAP 1.1/1.2 specification.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否必须按照 SOAP 1.1/1.2 规范解释标头。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the header must be understood; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果必须理解标头，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true` and the message receiver cannot interpret the message header, the message is not processed and an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 `true` 且消息接收方无法解释消息头，则不会处理消息并且会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `false`, the receiver can ignore the message header and continue processing.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 `false`，则接收方可忽略消息头并继续进行处理。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> that is used to serialize the header contents.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> 用于序列化标头内容。

trans-unit.source: The object that contains information related to the version of SOAP associated with a message and its exchange.
trans-unit.target: 包含与 SOAP 版本（与消息及其交换关联）相关的信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: Called when the header content is serialized using the specified XML writer.
trans-unit.target: 在使用指定的 XML 编写器序列化标头内容时调用。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> that is used to serialize the start header.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> 用于序列化开始标头。

trans-unit.source: The object that contains information related to the version of SOAP associated with a message and its exchange.
trans-unit.target: 包含与 SOAP 版本（与消息及其交换关联）相关的信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: Called when the start header is serialized using the specified XML writer.
trans-unit.target: 在使用指定的 XML 编写器序列化开始标头时调用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the header should be relayed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否应该中继标头。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the header should be relayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应该中继标头，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: According to SOAP 1.1 spec, this value is always `false`.
trans-unit.target: 根据 SOAP 1.1 规范，此值始终为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of this message header.
trans-unit.target: 返回该消息标头的字符串表示。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of this message header.
trans-unit.target: 该消息标头的字符串表示。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the header using an XML writer.
trans-unit.target: 使用 XML 编写器序列化标头。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> that is used to serialize the header.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" />，用于序列化标头。

trans-unit.source: The object that contains information related to the version of SOAP associated with a message and its exchange.
trans-unit.target: 包含与 SOAP 版本（与消息及其交换关联）相关的信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the header using the specified XML writer.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 XML 编写器序列化标头。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> that is used to serialize the header.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />，用于序列化标头。

trans-unit.source: The object that contains information related to the version of SOAP associated with a message and its exchange.
trans-unit.target: 包含与 SOAP 版本（与消息及其交换关联）相关的信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the header using the specified XML writer.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 XML 编写器序列化标头。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> that is used to serialize the header attributes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> 用于序列化标头特性。

trans-unit.source: The object that contains information related to the version of SOAP associated with a message and its exchange.
trans-unit.target: 包含与 SOAP 版本（与消息及其交换关联）相关的信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the header attributes using the specified XML writer.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 XML 编写器序列化标头特性。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> that is used to serialize the header contents.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 用于序列化标头内容。

trans-unit.source: The object that contains information related to the version of SOAP associated with a message and its exchange.
trans-unit.target: 包含与 SOAP 版本（与消息及其交换关联）相关的信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the header contents using the specified XML writer.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 XML 编写器序列化标头内容。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> that is used to serialize the start header.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> 用于序列化开始标头。

trans-unit.source: That object that contains information related to the version of SOAP associated with a message and its exchange.
trans-unit.target: 该对象包含与 SOAP 版本相关的信息，该版本与消息及其交换关联。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the start header using the specified XML writer.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 XML 编写器序列化开始标头。
